word_mean_info__list.difference: 口语中常用，指自然的或习惯的倾向，无特殊的褒贬意味，常指在一般情况下发生的事。
指确实可以察觉的倾向，也就是总结出来的规律。
指易于产生某种不利的结果，侧重偶然性，常表示警告或提醒。
侧重可能性，用于指将来，预言希望或所不希望的结果。
多用于人，着重其本性，或倾向于某种错误、弱点或不良行为等。
普通用词，含义广泛，但其范畴小于subject。既可指文章、讲话的题目，谈话的内容，又可指提纲中的标题甚至段落的主题或中心思想。
一般用词，使用广泛。指书籍、文章、演讲、讨论等中所隐含的、暗示的，需要由读者或听众推断的主题或中心话题。
系正式用词，多指文学、艺术作品的主题，或论文、演说的主题。
指有争论、议论，急需讨论研究的热点话题。

主题领域；主题区；主题范围
最喜欢的科目；最喜爱的学科

bilingual.source: There is a change of speaker or subject.
bilingual.target: 说话者或主题发生了变化。

bilingual.source: Non-fiction books are grouped together on the shelves by subject.
bilingual.target: 非虚构类书籍按主题分类放在书架上。

bilingual.source: Report texts often have words that are special to the subject.
bilingual.target: 报告文本通常有特定主题的词汇。

bilingual.source: Hey Roy, the subject for my school project is "Small inventions that changed the world."
bilingual.target: 嘿罗伊，我的学校项目主题是“小发明改变世界”。

bilingual.source: His knowledge of the subject is deficient.
bilingual.target: 他对这个主题的知识不足。

bilingual.source: She has a deep understanding of the subject.
bilingual.target: 她对这个主题有深刻的理解。

bilingual.source: The articles are indexed by subject and author.
bilingual.target: 文章按主题和作者编入索引。

bilingual.source: She has a perfecta understanding of the subject.
bilingual.target: 她对这个主题有完美的理解。

bilingual.source: She posses a deep understanding of the subject.
bilingual.target: 她拥有对这个主题的深刻理解。

list.abstract: subject，中文意思是课程、学习对象、研究对象。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, the question's off subject, but I'll answer it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个问题与主题无关但我还是回答吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you want to take over the questioning? Sure. Was virginity the subject of the lawsuit? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要换你来提问吗？好啊，贞操是诉讼案的主题吗？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Number one, knowing your subject backwards and forwards. Two, knowing exactly how you're gonna present it step-by-step.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一：彻底了解你的演讲主题！第二：逐项了解你要呈现的内容。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: No, you're displaying a shocking ignorance of the subject matter. Mummies and zombies are the exact same thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是你正表现出对谈话主题的高度无知，木乃伊与僵尸是一模一样的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: And then what I've done is I've cross-referenced them by subject. Right? So if you're looking up, let's say birthdays and dogs, you get Photo 152. See?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我已经依照主题，做好了交叉搜寻，好比你要找生日和狗，就会找到152号相片，你看。

yingyinNormal.en: You're changing the subject. What is the subject? Marijuana! Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在转移话题。话题是什么？大麻！没错。

yingyinNormal.en: And that one subject is stunning.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个受体表现惊人。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: Can we please change the subject?
yingyinNormal.zh: 能不能聊点别的？

yingyinNormal.en: That is all I have to say on the subject.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这件事我不想再多说什么了。

yingyinNormal.en: We agreed to test sparingly on one subject.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们说好先只在一个受体上保守试验的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: Sidao will never be a subject under the Khanate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 贾似道绝不会臣服于汗国的。

yingyinNormal.en: You brought up the subject. I contributed an interesting fact on that subject. It's called the art of conversation. Okay, your turn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你开始了一个话题，然后我回以与话题有关的有趣讯息，这就叫聊天的艺术啊，换你说了。

yingyinNormal.en: You're changing the subject. Yes. I am. Fine. I'll let you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在转移话题。是的，没错。好吧，让你刮。

yingyinNormal.en: No. She broke up with me before I could broach the subject.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我还没来得及提她就跟我分手了。

yingyinNormal.en: And on a totally separate subject, that is a lovely pantsuit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 题外话：好漂亮的套装。

yingyinNormal.en: I doubt that. He wouldn't want to subject you to more insults.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我看不是，他不会想让你再受羞辱的。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, gosh, I mean, there's so many of them. It's on every subject.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天啊，我是说，有太多了，几乎是每个项目都有。

yingyinNormal.en: And he was an ASA. Therefore, he's subject to retribution in jail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他还曾经是助理检察官，因此，他在监狱里是被报复的重点对象。

yingyinNormal.en: Can we please change the subject? Hi. Well, that didn't go your way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们能换个话题吗？嗨！貌似天不遂人愿啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Fornum's testimony is the most relevant as to how much pain is suffered in the subject of lethal injection because he was the subject of lethal injection.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佛努姆先生的证词是最能够证明死刑处决的痛苦程度，因为他曾接受过死刑处决。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 话题; 主题; 问题
学科; 科目; 课程

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 主观的；出于主观想法的；出自个人感情的；个人的；主语的；主格的；臆测的

word_family.mean: n. 题目；问题；主题；对象；学科；科目；课程；国民；臣民；臣服者；主体；主观；我；自我

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 从属于；受...支配；有...倾向的

examination_example.sentence: Each <highlight>subject</highlight> was then invited to look inside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后每个实验对象都被邀请去看里面。

examination_example.sentence: The study is a genome-wide analysis conducted on 1, 932 unique <highlight>subjects</highlight> which compared pairs of unrelated friends and unrelated strangers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究是对1932名独特的研究对象进行的全基因组分析，比较了没有血缘关系的朋友和没有血缘关系的陌生人。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Subjects</highlight> exposed to fast-food flashes also tend to think a musical piece lasts too long.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接触过快餐的研究对象也倾向于认为音乐片段持续时间过长。

sense_info_list.en: the thing that is being discussed, considered, or studied
sense_info_list.zh: 话题; 主题; 问题

examination_example.sentence: Some AI software can analyze and optimize marketing email <highlight>subject</highlight> lines to increase open rates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些人工智能软件可以分析和优化营销电子邮件主题，以提高点击率。

examination_example.sentence: How the whole image is then assembled and perceived is still a mystery although it is the <highlight>subject</highlight> of current research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管这是当前研究的主题，但如何组装和感知整个图像仍然是一个谜。

examination_example.sentence: Today, professors routinely treat the progressive interpretation of history and progressive public policy as the proper <highlight>subject</highlight> of study.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天，教授们习惯性地把对历史的进步解释和进步的公共政策作为恰当的研究主题。

sense_info_list.en: an area of knowledge studied in a school, college, etc.
sense_info_list.zh: 学科; 科目; 课程

examination_example.sentence: a greater emphasis on theoretical <highlight>subjects</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更强调理论学科

examination_example.sentence: There is just one path for a lawyer in most American states: a four-year undergraduate degree in some unrelated <highlight>subject</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国的大多数州，律师只有一条路可走：在一些不相关的课程获得四年本科学位。

examination_example.sentence: This policy does nothing to ensure that the homework students receive is meaningful or appropriate to their age and the <highlight>subject</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一政策并不能确保学生收到的家庭作业是有意义的或是适合他们的年龄和学科。

examination_example.sentence: Zoos, which spare no effort to take of animals, should not be <highlight>subjected</highlight> to unfair criticism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动物园不遗余力地饲养动物，不应受到不公平的批评。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Subject</highlight> to undesirable changes
examination_example.sentence_trans: 易受不良变化影响

examination_example.sentence: In 2006, the state went a step further, requiring that any extension of the plant's license be <highlight>subject</highlight> to the Vermont legislature's approval.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2006年，该州更进一步，要求工厂许可证的任何延期都必须得到佛蒙特州立法机关的批准。

sense_info_list.en: under the authority of somebody or something

examination_example.sentence: At the very least, the court should make itself <highlight>subject</highlight> to the code of conduct that applies to the rest of the federal judiciary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至少，法院应该让自己服从于适用于联邦司法系统其他部门的行为准则。

sense_info_list.en: a citizen or member of a state other than its supreme ruler

word_usage.usage: be subject to sth.既可以指“可能受……影响的”，也可以指“取决于；视……而定”以及“受……支配；服从于”

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指批评、学习、调查及用以实验的对象。
指行为、感觉、思考的对象。

exam_freq_info.chinese: [哲学]主观; 自我; 主体

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 主观的；出于主观想法的；出自个人感情的；个人的；主语的；主格的；臆测的

word_family.mean: n. 题目；问题；主题；对象；学科；科目；课程；国民；臣民；臣服者；主体；主观；我；自我

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 从属于；受...支配；取决于；使遭受

sense_info_list.en: a branch of knowledge studied or taught in a school, college, or university

examination_example.sentence: How do we know which <highlight>subjects</highlight> benefit society?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那我们又如何能知道哪些学科对社会有益呢？

examination_example.sentence: If we're going to force taxpayers to foot the bill for college degrees, students should only study those <highlight>subjects</highlight> that're of greatest benefit to taxpayers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们要强迫纳税人为大学学位买单，学生们应该只学习那些对纳税人最有益的科目。

sense_info_list.en: the thing that is being discussed, considered, or studied

examination_example.sentence: The most difficult <highlight>subjects</highlight> can be explained to the most slow-witted man if he has not formed any idea of them already.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使是头脑最迟钝的人，如果他还没有形成任何概念，最困难的问题也能解释给他听。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>subject</highlight> of automation and its role in our economy has taken hold in American public discourse.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自动化的主题及其在我们经济中的作用已经在美国公众的讨论中占据了一席之地。

examination_example.sentence: Pieces of science journalism can also oversimplify and generalize their <highlight>subject</highlight> material.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学新闻界也可能过度简化和概括其主题材料。

sense_info_list.en: a person who is written about in a book or who is shown in a picture
likely or prone to be affected by (a particular condition or occurrence, typically an unwelcome or unpleasant one)

examination_example.sentence: Neuroscientists, on the other hand, armed with brain scans and EEGs (脑电图), have not been <highlight>subject</highlight> to the same degree of critique.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，拥有大脑扫描和脑电图的神经科学家则没有受到同样程度的批评。

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>subject</highlight> to interpretation of statistics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这取决于对统计数据的解释。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>subject</highlight> the effects of tourism to scrutiny.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们对旅游业的影响进行了详细审查。

sense_info_list.en: a thinking or feeling entity; the conscious mind; the ego, especially as opposed to anything external to the mind
sense_info_list.zh: [哲学]主观; 自我; 主体

word_usage.usage: subject作名词“学科”时，是一个抽象概念，不能用来表示具体的课程，因此英语课一般说English class不能说English subject。

exam_freq_info.chinese: [哲学]主观; 自我; 主体

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 主观的；出于主观想法的；出自个人感情的；个人的；主语的；主格的；臆测的

word_family.mean: n. 题目；问题；主题；对象；学科；科目；课程；国民；臣民；臣服者；主体；主观；我；自我

sense_info_list.en: the thing that is being discussed; considered; or studied

examination_example.sentence: Some argue that there's not enough research on the <highlight>subject</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人认为对这一问题的研究还不足够。

examination_example.sentence: Indicate they have reflected and thought about the <highlight>subject</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 表明他们对这一主题进行了反思和思考。

examination_example.sentence: It is not convincing if you say you have chosen the <highlight>subject</highlight> because you enjoy it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你说你选择这个科目是因为你喜欢它，这是没有说服力的。

sense_info_list.en: a branch of knowledge studied or taught in a school; college; or university

examination_example.sentence: I feel like this is a shift away form a <highlight>subject</highlight> matter-based curriculum to a more experiential curriculum or learning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我觉得这是一种基于学科主题的课程向体验式课程或学习的转变。

examination_example.sentence: I think a maker space is more like a like a library in that there are multiple <highlight>subjects</highlight> and multiple things that you can learn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为创客空间更像是一个图书馆，因为在那里你可以学习各种科目和各种知识。

examination_example.sentence: What seems to be missing in school is how these <highlight>subjects</highlight> integrate, how they fit together in any meaningful way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学校欠缺的似乎是如何将这些学科融会贯通，以及如何用有意义的方式使之相辅相成。

examination_example.sentence: Now educators are experimenting with ways to apply this model to academic <highlight>subjects</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，教育工作者正在研究如何将这种模式应用于学术科目。

sense_info_list.en: a person who is written about in a book or who is shown in a picture

examination_example.sentence: One group of <highlight>subjects</highlight> did a boring activity first, while the others went straight to the creative task.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一组受试者需首先做一份枯燥的工作，而另一组则直接从事创造性的工作。

examination_example.sentence: Some asked <highlight>subjects</highlight> about incidents where someone close to them-family or friend-had called them by another person's name.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些调查询问受测者，他们身边的人、家人或朋友是否曾用另一个人的名字称呼他们。

examination_example.sentence: The other surveys asked about times when <highlight>subjects</highlight> had themselves called someone close to them by the wrong name.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一些调查则询问了受测者自己叫错亲近的人名字的情况。

sense_info_list.en: a thinking or feeling entity; the conscious mind; the ego; especially as opposed to anything external to the mind
sense_info_list.zh: [哲学]主观; 自我; 主体

sense_info_list.en: bring a person or country under one's control or jurisdiction; typically by using force

examination_example.sentence: His 2016 study of K-12 social studies textbooks and teacher manuals found that Asian Americans were poorly represented at best, and <highlight>subjected</highlight> to racist caricatures (拙劣的模仿) at worst.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在2016年对K-12社会研究教科书和教师手册的研究发现，亚裔美国人在最好的情况下代表性不足，在最坏的情况下遭受种族主义漫画的攻击。

word_usage.usage: subject作名词“学科”时，是一个抽象概念，不能用来表示具体的课程，因此英语课一般说English class不能说English subject。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 为常用语，所指范围广，指讨论的对象或文章的主题。
着重指文化产物的主题。
常指谈论、演讲等较明确的主题。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 主观的；出于主观想法的；出自个人感情的；个人的；主语的；主格的；臆测的

word_family.mean: n. 题目；问题；主题；对象；学科；科目；课程；国民；臣民；臣服者；主体；主观；我；自我

examination_example.sentence: We establish a <highlight>subject</highlight> that we will discuss throughout the procedure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们确定了一个我们将在整个过程中讨论的主题。

examination_example.sentence: A history book which may contain the facts in story form will be easier to read than one dealing with scientific <highlight>subjects</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一本以故事形式包含事实的历史书比一本论述科学主题的书更容易阅读。

examination_example.sentence: The exhibition follows a path of time and <highlight>subject</highlight> with the visitor exiting through the brain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 展览遵循时间和主题的路径，参观者通过大脑离开。

examination_example.sentence: Generalists, on the other hand, know a lot about a wide range of <highlight>subjects</highlight> and view the whole with all its connections.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，通才则对广泛的学科有很多了解，并通过所有的联系来观察整体。

examination_example.sentence: Why, is art so widely considered to be “the easy <highlight>subject</highlight>” at school, insignificant to wider society, a waste of time and effort?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，为什么艺术在学校里仍然被普遍认为是“简单的科目”，对更广泛的社会来说无足轻重，是浪费时间和精力呢？

examination_example.sentence: Popularity is a well-explored <highlight>subject</highlight> in social psychology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大众化是社会心理学中一个广泛研究的课题。

examination_example.sentence: Questions about <highlight>subject</highlight> content are generally welcomed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于话题内容的问题通常是受欢迎的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a branch of knowledge studied or taught in a school, college, or university

examination_example.sentence: In China, schools are now thinking about teaching life skills as a <highlight>subject</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在中国，学校现在正在考虑将生活技能作为一门学科来教授。

examination_example.sentence: What <highlight>subject</highlight> is Linda interested in?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 琳达对什么科目感兴趣？

examination_example.sentence: Though he did well in maths and science, he failed in many <highlight>subjects</highlight> like history, geography and languages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然他在数学和科学方面成绩很好，但在历史、地理和语言等许多科目上都不及格。

sense_info_list.en: the thing that is being discussed, considered, or studied

examination_example.sentence: Present an opinion on a <highlight>subject</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就某一话题发表意见。

examination_example.sentence: When talking to British people, we should avoid <highlight>subjects</highlight> like age, weight or money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与英国人交谈时，我们应该避免年龄、体重或金钱等话题。

examination_example.sentence: Also, mother love is a repeated <highlight>subject</highlight> in Chinese ancient poems, like "Song of the Parting Son" by Meng Jiao, a poet of the Tang dynasty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，母爱是中国古诗中反复出现的主题，如唐代诗人孟郊的《游子吟》。

word_usage.usage: subject作名词“学科”时，是一个抽象概念，不能用来表示具体的课程，因此英语课一般说English class不能说English subject。
